Name: Sneak Attack
Description: Pick up the Beast and place it on any space. Kill all Acolytes on that space and move any Colossi to adjacent spaces as usual (each Colossus on that space is moved by its owner).

Name: Rampage
Description: Move the Beast twice (the Beast can only move to adjacent spaces). In both spaces you moved to, kill all Acolytes and force Colossi to move to adjacent spaces (each Colossus is moved by its owner).

Description: Pick up any 2 Loot Tokens and move each of them to a different spaces. The space you moved it to now has multiple rewards.

Description: Pick a Loot token on a space that is not occupied by the Beast or Colossi, then swap that token with an Environment tile.

Description: Kill every Acolyte adjacent to the Beast.

Name: Ritual Sacrifice
Description: For any Acolyte (including your own Acolytes) on any of the Environment tiles, roll the die, and kill the Acolyte if you roll 1 or 2 (Clarify which Acolyte you are rolling for before each roll)
